name: Warding Rune
summary: Your runes provide a warding effect that protects you against a specific school of magic.
description:
Your runes provide a warding effect that protects you against a specific school of magic. Choose a school of magic other than divination. You gain a rune on your body corresponding to that school, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against effects of that school.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
